<!-- Floating toggle button -->
<button class="awards-toggle" id="toggleAll" onclick="toggleAllDetails()">
  Expand All
</button>

<script>
function toggleAllDetails() {
  const details = document.querySelectorAll('details');
  const button = document.getElementById('toggleAll');
  const isExpanding = button.textContent === 'Expand All';
  
  details.forEach(detail => {
    detail.open = isExpanding;
  });
  
  button.textContent = isExpanding ? 'Collapse All' : 'Expand All';
}

// Update button text based on current state
function updateToggleButton() {
  const details = document.querySelectorAll('details');
  const button = document.getElementById('toggleAll');
  const openCount = Array.from(details).filter(detail => detail.open).length;
  
  if (openCount === 0) {
    button.textContent = 'Expand All';
  } else if (openCount === details.length) {
    button.textContent = 'Collapse All';
  } else {
    button.textContent = 'Expand All';
  }
}

// Listen for individual details changes
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const details = document.querySelectorAll('details');
  details.forEach(detail => {
    detail.addEventListener('toggle', updateToggleButton);
  });
});
</script>

I enjoy working with students of all ages and make an effort to mentor the next generation each year. I have served as a mentor for 7 students across 8 projects through 4 programs ([DAGSI](https://www.soche.org/programs-and-services/employers/dagsi/), [LEGACY](https://wpafbstem.com/LEGACY/legacy_overview.html), [SMART](https://www.smartscholarship.org/smart/en), [Wright Scholar](https://wpafbstem.com/Wright_Scholar/Wright_scholar.html)).

<script>
// Create dots for mentoring slideshow
const numMentoringSlides = document.getElementsByClassName("mentoring-slide").length;
const mentoringDotsContainer = document.getElementById("mentoring-slideshow-dots");
mentoringDotsContainer.innerHTML = Array.from({length: numMentoringSlides}, (_, i) =>
  `<span class="mentoring-dot" onclick="currentMentoringSlide(${i+1})" style="cursor: pointer; height: 12px; width: 12px; margin: 0 2px; background-color: #bbb; border-radius: 50%; display: inline-block; transition: background-color 0.3s;"></span>`
).join(' ');

let mentoringSlideIndex = 1;
showMentoringSlides(mentoringSlideIndex);

function plusMentoringSlides(n) {showMentoringSlides(mentoringSlideIndex += n);}
function currentMentoringSlide(n) {showMentoringSlides(mentoringSlideIndex = n);}
function showMentoringSlides(n) {
  let i;
  let slides = document.getElementsByClassName("mentoring-slide");
  let dots = document.getElementsByClassName("mentoring-dot");
  if (n > slides.length) {mentoringSlideIndex = 1}
  if (n < 1) {mentoringSlideIndex = slides.length}
  for (i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
    slides[i].classList.remove("active");
  }
  for (i = 0; i < dots.length; i++) {
    dots[i].style.backgroundColor = "#bbb";
  }
  slides[mentoringSlideIndex-1].classList.add("active");
  dots[mentoringSlideIndex-1].style.backgroundColor = "#553590";
}

// Auto-play for mentoring slideshow
setInterval(() => {plusMentoringSlides(1);}, 8000);
</script>
